ygData.subject: Re: Pugius Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: Pugius is a drop off the Lesser Balde Fiend in Unrest. It s a (really?) rare spawn who is level 21. You ll either get pugius or gladius. The fiend looks kinda
ygData.messageBody:
Pugius is a drop off the Lesser Balde Fiend in Unrest. It's a (really?) rare
spawn who is level 21. You'll either get pugius or gladius. The fiend looks
kinda like an enchanter animation, just way better, more weapons and all
this rotating at high speed, really cool sight and sounds.

Thormael


>From: "Ben Wilson" <ruldaas@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Pugius Dagger
>Date: Fri, 15 Oct 1999 14:05:55 PDT
>
>I acquired a Pugius dagger quite some time ago from a friendly bard for
>only
>25pp. It's stats are 6dam 23 delay magic peircing. Its damage ratio is
>just a little bit better than a Dragoon dirk but it doesn't have any stat
>increases. What I'm curious to know is where can this weapon be found? It
>looks just like a regular or a rusty dagger and mine is the only one I've
>ever seen. I forgot to ask the bard I got it from where he got it...so any
>help would be appreciated. I'm guessing that because it has the same
>graphic as a regular or rusty many people overlook this fine weapon.
>
>
>
>Ruldaas Riverdance
